dta.PlanCollectionInfo¶

class PlanCollectionInfo(startTime, endTime, name, description)¶

Bases: object

Contains user information for a collection of signals belonging to the same time period

A PlanCollectionInfo object has some general info for all the time plans that are active between startTime and endTime. The inputs to the constructor are:

  • startTime: a dta.Utils.Time object representing the start time of the time plan collection
  • endTime: a dta.Utils.Time object representing the end time of the time plan collection
  • name: a string containing the name of the plan collection
  • description: a string containing the description of the plan collection
__init__(startTime, endTime, name, description)¶

A PlanCollectionInfo object has some general info for all the time plans that are active between startTime and endTime. The inputs to the constructor are:

  • startTime: a dta.Utils.Time object representing the start time of the time plan collection
  • endTime: a dta.Utils.Time object representing the end time of the time plan collection
  • name: a string containing the name of the plan collection
  • description: a string containing the description of the plan collection

getDynameqStr()¶

Return a Dynameq parsable string containing information about the time plan such as the start time, the end time, its name, and description

getTimePeriod()¶

Return a tuple of two dta.Utils.Time objects corresponding to the start and end time of the plan collection
